channel.title: CVE Feed for Leevio -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Leevio -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-51676|2024-08-02T22:40:34.194Z -- leevio -- happy%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Leevio Happy Addons for Elementor.This issue affects Happy Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 3.9.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-29108|2024-08-02T01:03:51.787Z -- leevio -- happy%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Leevio Happy Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Happy Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 3.10.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-24833|2024-06-04T17:43:08.780Z -- leevio -- happy%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Leevio Happy Addons for Elementor.This issue affects Happy Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 3.10.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-32698|2024-06-04T17:50:46.689Z -- leevio -- happy%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Leevio Happy Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Happy Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 3.10.4.
